*div1 type="summary"* *p*Robert Lewis to Austin, May 12, 1826. His disputes with the comisario of Santa Rosa. Prospect of trade between north Mexican States and Texas. Bastrop.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col Austin, */person_mentioned* *location_mentioned* Santa Rosa*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="05-12-1826">12th May 1826*/date_mentioned* */p* *p*D. sir, I am yet detaind here by the *person_mentioned*comisary */person_mentioned*I have expected every Mail, for the last 50 days to of gotten a discharge from the detention, The business is now before the *person_mentioned*President */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*, and he has requested, that I should make a full statement of every thing that has taken place between me and the *person_mentioned*Comisary*/person_mentioned*, who has wrote several letters to *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*against me, has committted himself so its of no effect, My Statement is proven in a proper Manner, and left here *date_mentioned n="05-04-1826">eight days since*/date_mentioned*, as soon as it can reach *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*it will be acted on, the *person_mentioned*Comisary */person_mentioned*is verry uneasy he has resigned his office,—I have no doubt but the trade from this quarter, May be drawn to the *location_mentioned*Brasses*/location_mentioned*, I am endeavouring to effect this object, Severel *person_mentioned*Gentlemen */person_mentioned*of standing has promised as soon as there is a commercial House establishd, then they will come there to trade—I recd a letter the other day from our friend the *person_mentioned*Barron */person_mentioned*he was unwell at that time, A *person_mentioned*Docr */person_mentioned*from *location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned* was here the other day and sais he has the Dropsy in the chest, he speaks of going to *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*in a short time,—Inclosd is a letter to *person_mentioned*Col. Bynum*/person_mentioned* I hope you will forward by the first safe opertunity.—The *person_mentioned*Indians */person_mentioned*are very troublesome at *person_mentioned*Sant Fernandes*/person_mentioned*, they have taken a part of there public Caviyard they have not done any Mischief here for some time
*/p**p**person_mentioned*Robert Lewis*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*(Address) *person_mentioned* Col Estephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned*, *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned*, *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*P. S. Since I wrote the above I have recd information from *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*, that my business has taken a turn in my favour, but was waiting for the Documents, I have aluded to*/p*
*/div1*
